data.name: Sponsorship700Content
data.value:
Partner logo inclusion in the conference's marketing campaign.
Exclusive announcements of the strategic partnership before, during, and after the conference.
Partner logo displayed across all conference elements (entrance gate, directional signage, registration area, welcome board, conference screens, and advertising boards within the university).
Partnership announcement across all advertising channels.
Two full-page advertisements in the University Message newsletter, distributed weekly to all 28 colleges of King Saud University.
Marketing space in the electronic version of the University Message newsletter.
Advertising spaces on the university’s external and internal digital screens network.
Coordination and relationship-building with sponsors, partners, and conference teams.
Participation in presenting the Creativity Award.
Exhibition space of 50 square meters.
Participation in two panel discussions.
Delivery of two workshops.
Partner recognition by the event sponsor.
